org.openqa.selenium.remote.http

Interface HttpClient


  • public interface HttpClient
    Defines a simple client for making HTTP requests.

      HttpResponse execute(HttpRequest request)

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        @Deprecated
HttpResponse execute(HttpRequest request,
                                 boolean followRedirects)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        Deprecated. All call sites found set followRedirects to true. Use execute(HttpRequest).
        Executes the given request.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to execute.
        followRedirects - whether to automatically follow redirects.
        Returns:
        the final response.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
